txt_en: Happy New Year! Wish you peace and good luck this year.
txt_cn: 新年快乐！愿你新年平平安安，好运连连。

txt_en: We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone.
txt_cn: 在探寻生命意义的旅途上，我们并非孤身一人。

txt_en: The most important time is now.

txt_cn: 爱，不是用眼睛看，而是用心去感受。
